description: One of the best and most feature-complete editor for Linux right now!
The only app on linux ive met that has a powerful search across different types of numeric values etc
Works perfectly. Any issues I have with it is just the visual style and font choice. Otherthan that great software with no complaintes of functionality.

There is no reason for this application to have a persistent background process. This did not look right to me, so I am taking this off for now until I understand why it leaves these processes lurking on the system. 

Just being extra careful.
summary: Why is this App always running in the background? Off it for now
